casebody.data:
PURDUE PHARMA L.P., et al., petitioners,
v.
UNITED STATES EX REL. Steven MAY and Angela Radcliffe. No. 13-1162. Supreme Court of the United States June 1, 2015.

Opinion

Motion of The Pharmaceuticals Research and Manufacturers of America, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Washington Legal Foundation for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
